name: todo_back
description: Node.js package to handle the back of a todo

scripts.todo: concurrently "npm run serv1" "npm run serv2" "npm run serv3"
scripts.todo_nodemon: concurrently "npx nodemon -e js index.js port=4001" "npx nodemon -e js index.js port=4002" "npx nodemon -e js index.js port=4003"
